title: Arumukha nAthan pOL AdarippOrum
sahitya:
Arumukha nAthan pOl AdarippOrum uNDO pEraruL kUrndE tan pAdam paNindOrai


anupallavi

  sIrum kaDalin Oram sIruDaiya cendUril vArik-koDai vazhangum vaLLalAi viLangum


caraNam    aNi aNiyAi vandu piNi tIra vENumenru paNindiDum anbarai aNaittiDum ayyan
tuNai ninravar paDum tunbam aghanriDavE iNaiyinrip-parindu inba sukham IndiDum
